screen_desc: The screenshot shows a smartphone display of the In-N-Out Burger Menu, focusing on the Beverages section and part of the Others section. The beverage options include Coke, Diet Coke, Seven Up, Dr Pepper, Root Beer, Iced Tea, Pink Lemonade, and Lemonade. The Others section lists food items with prices, such as Double-Double for $4.95, Cheeseburger for $3.45, and Hamburger for $3.05. Additionally, there are other items like Milk and Hot Cocoa listed at the bottom, with Hot Cocoa priced at $2.00. The screen includes a navigation bar at the bottom, signal strength, and battery status at the top.
